医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
蜱虫可能是慢性消耗性疾病的新载体威斯康星大学麦迪逊分校研究人员的一项新研究发现，蜱虫体内含有可传播的导致慢性消耗性疾病（CWD）的蛋白质颗粒，这表明这种寄生虫可能是该疾病在威斯康星州鹿之间传播的媒介。她的研究结果发表在《自然》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Ticks-could-be-a-new-vector-for-chronic-wasting-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Ticks-could-be-a-new-vector-for-chronic-wasting-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76ce8ae8-ff93-459f-b7ef-a44e1e0ce146 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 14:18:04 -0400 Ticks could be a new vector for chronic wasting disease
确定了早发性冠状动脉疾病的新分子途径一种新的分子途径可以解释 ACTA2 基因突变如何导致 30 多岁的个体胆固醇水平正常且没有其他危险因素；休斯敦大学健康中心的研究人员表示，已经确定会导致冠状动脉疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/New-molecular-pathway-identified-for-early-onset-coronary-artery-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/New-molecular-pathway-identified-for-early-onset-coronary-artery-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a216adda-e184-4c9b-8cef-45a2b5880bb5 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 14:16:36 -0400 New molecular pathway identified for early onset coronary artery disease
研究发现植物细胞推开微管来控制细胞分裂每次干细胞分裂时，一个子细胞仍然是干细胞，而另一个子细胞则开始自己的发育之旅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Plant-cells-push-away-microtubules-to-control-cell-division-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Plant-cells-push-away-microtubules-to-control-cell-division-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35ac727a-95be-4634-81e4-76f4ece4f29e Fri, 07 Jul 2023 13:59:46 -0400 Plant cells push away microtubules to control cell division, study finds
研究发现，患有线粒体疾病的儿童对病毒感染的抗体反应较弱在一项新的研究中，美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员发现，患有线粒体疾病的儿童 B 细胞功能的改变导致对病毒感染的抗体反应较弱且多样性较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Children-with-mitochondrial-disorders-have-weaker-antibody-response-to-viral-infections-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Children-with-mitochondrial-disorders-have-weaker-antibody-response-to-viral-infections-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b821a44e-2125-41c2-8e18-24c1c9b23e95 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 13:52:57 -0400 Children with mitochondrial disorders have weaker antibody response to viral infections, study finds
棋盘游戏提高幼儿的数学技能根据对过去 23 年发表的有关该主题的研究的综合回顾，基于数字的棋盘游戏，如《大富翁》、《黑白棋》、《滑梯和梯子》，可以提高幼儿的数学能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Board-games-improve-math-skills-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Board-games-improve-math-skills-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b50cf374-8544-4ecf-bb95-c3fb7f7fcb3f Fri, 07 Jul 2023 13:32:35 -0400 Board games improve math skills in young children
蜱虫季节来了：如何避免蜱虫现在是蜱虫季节，挪威阿格德尔大学的研究人员揭示了有关这些寄生虫的神话和事实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Tick-season-is-here-How-to-avoid-ticks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Tick-season-is-here-How-to-avoid-ticks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1154a6a6-dab7-4419-b098-3855d1b8aee6 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 13:09:42 -0400 Tick season is here: How to avoid ticks
生产处方计划可为美国医疗保健系统节省 400 亿美元塔夫茨大学弗里德曼营养科学与政策学院的研究人员在 7 月 7 日发表在《美国医学杂志》上的一项新研究中表示，每天一苹果不仅让医生远离我，还可以为美国节省至少 400 亿美元的医疗费用。美国心脏协会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Produce-prescription-programs-could-save-US-healthcare-system-2440-billion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Produce-prescription-programs-could-save-US-healthcare-system-2440-billion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec2eefda-4c96-419b-b7d7-44c13e1e4137 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 12:57:26 -0400 Produce prescription programs could save US healthcare system $40 billion
研究人员调查了奶牛低生育力与子宫微生物群之间的关联生育力下降延长了奶牛从产犊到受孕的时间间隔，给奶牛场造成重大经济损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-investigate-the-association- Between-low-fertility-and-uterine-microbiota-in-dairy-cows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-investigate-the-association- Between-low-fertility-and-uterine-microbiota-in-dairy-cows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96a66001-e8c4-4beb-b3cc-1a718208fcf7 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 12:40:18 -0400 Researchers investigate the association between low fertility and uterine microbiota in dairy cows
研究人员展示了肿瘤微环境中的通信网络如何促进癌症生长肿瘤由直接环境中实际的恶性癌细胞和健康的未转化细胞组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-show-how-communication-networks-in-the-tumor-microenvironment-promote-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-show-how-communication-networks-in-the-tumor-microenvironment-promote-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2e787c4-ee7e-477c-b8dd-22a7db20dfe7 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 07:22:39 -0400 Researchers show how communication networks in the tumor microenvironment promote cancer growth
Spectrum CE 系统：适用于法医实验室工作流程的毛细管电泳仪器在本次采访中，NewsMedical 与 Ben Krenke 讨论了用于法医实验室工作流程的 Spectrum CE 系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/The-Spectrum-CE-System-A-capillary- electrophoresis-instrument-for-the-forensic-laboratory-workflow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/The-Spectrum-CE-System-A-capillary- electrophoresis-instrument-for-the-forensic-laboratory-workflow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97c41e7c-11de-4657-906b-8942a0907141 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 06:41:00 -0400 The Spectrum CE System: A capillary electrophoresis instrument for the forensic laboratory workflow
